        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
        if (!newValue || newValue == '') {
             g_form.setDisplay('u_group', false);
             return;
	}
	
        u_groupg_filter.reset();
	   u_groupg_filter.setQuery('u_department=' + newValue);
        u_groupacRequest(null);
        g_form.setDisplay('u_group', true);

}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>Client Script</script_type>
        <short_description>To filter the choices in a list collector based on the value of another field</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
